Metagross (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0375: Metang
Pokémon
#0377: Regirock →

Metagross has been featured on 26 different cards since it debuted in the EX Hidden Legends expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Metagross cards are normally Metal-type or Psychic-type Stage 2 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Metagross

Metagross
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
